Title: Annabelle & Bear
Writer: Tracey Sims, Amy S. Weber (story), Amy S. Weber
Actors: Curt Massof, Olivia Walby, Ruby Harris, Jason Myres
Plot: The dramatic, tender story of a man who finds himself suddenly thrust into fatherhood, and the unexpected journey that leads him to discover the life-altering love found in the heart of his little girl.
